jobDescription: The Routine Maintenance Technician provides support for food manufacturers in an assigned a territory and is dispatched to customer sites to service, food processing and packaging machinery. As part of a highly motivated team of well-rounded professionals, the mission is to assure that equipment is well maintained earning high customer satisfaction ratings.Duties and ResponsibilitiesRoutine Maintenance Technicians will be trained at Reiser Headquarters in Canton, MA to perform all routine maintenance tasks required for a particular machine type.Utilizing a company provided vehicle you will travel to customer sites and perform routine maintenance on their equipment.Daily travel 100% within territory.Perform routine replacement of parts and machine diagnostics.Engage with customer on site, completely check over machine and provide an itemized checklist for the customer to review at the end of each visit.Instruct customers in routine maintenance techniques.QualificationsRequired – Technical school training, civilian or military.Preferred – 1 year relevant hands-on machine repair experience and experience with common hand tools.Mechanical aptitude.100% daily travel, back home in the evening.Must live within 1 hour of major city within designated territory.Working ConditionsRoutine Maintenance Technicians may work in high pressure situations to assist customers in repairs essential to their operation.They may also be required to work different shifts during the day or night and will work many Saturdays.Extreme temperatures ranging from 25 degrees to 110 degrees.Guaranteed 50 hours per week.Other Physical DemandsThe standard physical demands include standing, kneeling, crawling, laying and sitting for long periods of time (6-8 hours) with minimal breaks.The typical work environment floors are concrete or smooth brick and usually cluttered and wet.Lifting 50 – 75lbs and crawling under and into machine frames with a working height range of between 6" and 35" to make adjustments or install / remove parts is a normal.
